rules.text: AWA + [reason]: Investigate [2] the local ruins with Silaro to add [progress] to a ruin or machine equal to your effort. Then add an equal amount of [progress] to Silaro.
If there is an active predator, exhaust it. »» Add [harm] to this being equal to that predator's presence.

Response: When you resolve a challenge effect on this machine, you may discard [progress] from it equal to a feature's presence to affect that feature instead of the feature noted in the challenge effect.
Exhaust the active feature with the lowest presence.
Discard the exhausted feature with the lowest presence. Each Ranger whose [Ranger Token] was on that feature suffers 1 injury.
When this feature enters play, each Ranger moves their [Ranger Token] to it as you make your way into the passages carved into the massive pieces of stone.
AWA + [exploration]: Circumnavigate the detritus to remove your [Ranger Token] from this feature.
